text: Today's stage was really great too, Mikoto!

Come to think of it, this time the dance was different from
your usual energetic routines, it had a somewhat relaxed feel to it...

Yeah, when I consulted with the choreographer,
they came up with moves that matched the costumes.

Producer, you mentioned that the costumes had
an elegant atmosphere when you saw them.

so I thought it would be nice to have
choreography that reflected that...

It seemed to shine in a different way than usual,
I guess you could say.
If it looked like that, I'm glad.

I believe that the efforts from back then and the
efforts now... are all connected to the future.
